Uses of Package
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options

Packages that use xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options
Package
Description
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options
Contains pub subcommand or global option with feature.
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd
Provides all supported pub subcommands except pub global which do nothing when execute it on JVM.
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.exceptions.cmd
Provides all exception needed for throwing related Exception under xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.
  • Classes in xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options used by xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.options
    Class
    Description
    AbstractedPubOption
    A factory for building PubOption with implemented AbstractedPubOption.buildOption() already.
    PubDisableAllowedOption
    An option can be parsed as disable with giving 'no-' prefix before the option name.
    PubOption
    An entity of the option which uses for apply it in the subcommand.
    PubOptionWithValue
    A PubOption parsed with given value.
    PubStyleOption
    An option for PubDepsSubCommand that to configure how dependencies information shown.
    PubStyleOption.StyleLayout
    An Enum for applying value in PubStyleOption.
    PubVerbosityOption
    An global option that to determine level of the information will be displayed.
    PubVerbosityOption.VerbosityLevel
    An Enum for PubVerbosityOption that to determine what information will be displayed or not.
